title: Specially Made Costumes
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Waah~~~! Amazing, it really suits you, Shizuku-chan! Your theater club costumes are so well made~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>They are, right? The teacher that’s in charge of the costumes is very particular about them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmm…. Shizuku-chan, can you try turning around<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Like…. this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I see….! The width of the drapes has been changed. That’s why they spread out so nicely…. Then, can you try jumping<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>O-, okay…. Was that good enough?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Shizuku-chan….! Huuug!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kyaah! W-, what’s this all of a sudden, You-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, sorry. I was so moved by how well made this costume is…. Hey, Shizuku-chan, if there are other costumes, can you wear them as well? Nijigaku’s theater club costumes are amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>T-, thank you very much! I’m happy that you’re praising it, but I’m starting to get embarrassed, so please let go of me already~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
